At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. "I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other." Michael Vick

Cairo. This, Donald Rumsfeld said, has proven to be "confusing." "It certainly doesn't give one confidence," the former secretary said of the administration's public steps. One doesn't know precisely what's taking place with private diplomacy-- what's really most effective-- but certainly the public diplomacy has been somewhat confusing. Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak for decades, responded carefully when asked whether he is a dictator.

Among the candidates Mike Pence helped was Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race against Democratic Rep. Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana. Jackie Walorski said Mike Pence can appeal to both social and economic conservatives. I know he feels pulled because there is a great campaign to recruit him at the federal level, she said. "I'm going to be excited whatever door he picks." If Mike Pence does decide to run for president, he'll likely have to start working quickly to raise campaign money.

the tech industry. Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin have long run Google as a trio, an approach they spelled out in an "owner's manual" included in the company's 2004 IPO filing. We run Google as a triumvirate, Page and Sergey Brin wrote. "The three of us run the company collaboratively with Sergey Brin and me as presidents.
